trans-unit.source: Authenticates a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"></xref> security token using a custom authentication scheme.
trans-unit.target: 进行身份验证<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"></xref>使用自定义身份验证方案的安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: Override the CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator class when the Windows authentication provided by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator> class isn't sufficient.
trans-unit.target: 重写 CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator 类，当 Windows 身份验证由提供<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator>类不理想。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator> class authenticates the user name and password in a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken> security token as a Windows account.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator>类进行身份验证的用户名和密码在<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken>作为 Windows 帐户的安全令牌。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.WindowsUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator>

trans-unit.source: To provide a custom authentication scheme, derive a class from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator> class, implement the authentication scheme, and then pass that class to the constructor for the CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator class.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供自定义身份验证方案，可从<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator>类，实现身份验证方案和则传递该为 CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator 类的构造函数的类</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator>派生一个类

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator"></xref> class using the specified validator.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator"></xref>类使用指定的验证程序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator> specified in the `validator` parameter is used by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateUserNamePasswordCore%2A> method to authenticate the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator>中指定`validator`参数由<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateUserNamePasswordCore%2A>方法进行身份验证用户。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator.ValidateUserNamePasswordCore%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator"></xref> that authenticates the user name and password using a custom authentication scheme.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator"> </xref>的用户名和密码使用自定义身份验证方案进行的身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Authenticates the specified user name and password and returns the set of authorization policies for <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"></xref> security tokens.
trans-unit.target: 指定的用户名和密码进行身份验证并返回对的授权策略集<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.UserNameSecurityToken"></xref>安全令牌。

trans-unit.source: The ValidateUserNamePasswordCore method uses the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator> passed into the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator.%23ctor%2A> constructor to authenticate the user.
trans-unit.target: ValidateUserNamePasswordCore 方法使用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator>传入<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator.%23ctor%2A>构造函数来验证用户身份。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.CustomUserNameSecurityTokenAuthenticator.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator>

trans-unit.source: When the username and password cannot be validated, throw the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException>.
trans-unit.target: 无法验证的用户名和密码时, 引发<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException>

trans-unit.source: When there are no authorization policies in effect for this application, return an empty <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of type <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy>.
trans-unit.target: 当没有对此应用程序生效的授权策略，则返回空<xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>的类型<xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> </xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>

trans-unit.source: When `null` is returned from the ValidateUserNamePasswordCore method, [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/add/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] throws the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException>.
The user name associated with the security token.
trans-unit.target: 与安全令牌相关联的用户名。

trans-unit.source: The password associated with the security token.
trans-unit.target: 与安全令牌相关联的密码。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"></xref> that contains the set of authorization policies in effect for this application.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601>类型的<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy"> </xref> ，包含对此应用程序生效的授权策略集。
